pr_title: ISPN-11398 Add template for a Protobuf cache

timeline.message: ISPN-11398 Add template for a Protobuf cache
ISPN-11398 Add template for a Protobuf cache

timeline.bodyText: Is "example.PROTOBUF_DIST" the first of this kind? Are we settled on using the example  prefix for these? any other example of example?
timeline.author: anistor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -25,6 +25,11 @@
       <distributed-cache-configuration name="org.infinispan.DIST_SYNC" remote-timeout="17500" configuration="org.infinispan.LOCAL">
          <state-transfer timeout="60000"/>
       </distributed-cache-configuration>
+      <distributed-cache-configuration name="example.PROTOBUF_DIST" remote-timeout="17500" configuration="org.infinispan.LOCAL">
